thread.title: Executive Vice-President Inaba awarded Takeda Medical Prize (30 September 2015) (Kyoto University)
thread.title_full: Executive Vice-President Inaba awarded Takeda Medical Prize (30 September 2015) (Kyoto University) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Executive Vice-President Inaba awarded Takeda Medical Prize (30 September 2015) (Kyoto University)
text: ( Source : Kyoto University ) Professor Kayo Inaba, Executive Vice-President for Gender Equality , International Affairs , and Public Relations , has been awarded the 2015 Takeda Medical Prize (Takeda Igaku Sho ). Administered by Takeda Science
